meta.name: description
meta.content: River Forest Public School District 90 serves grades K-8 through three schools: Lincoln (K-4), Willard (K-4) and Roosevelt (5-8). Current total enrollment is around 1,350.

Welcome to River Forest School District 90 located in River Forest Illinois
River Forest Public School District 90 serves grades K-8 through three schools: Lincoln (K-4), Willard (K-4) and Roosevelt (5-8). Current total enrollment is around 1,350.
